text: S8 (S0-4) is a B-type star located in the Galactic Center. It has a spectral class of B0-2 V and has a radius of 4.47 solar radii. Based on its spectral class (B0-2 V), it probably has a temperature of 20,600-31,400 kelvin. It has an eccentricity of 0.8031, an K-band apparent magnitude of 14.50, an orbital period of 92.9 years around Sagittarius A*, and a speed of 1.07% lightspeed. Category:Stars
title: S8
